level.heading: Capital Review and Debt Affordability Committee.

level.text: There is established a Capital Review and Debt Affordability Committee.
The Committee shall consist of the following 5 members:
One individual appointed by the Mayor; and
The Director of the Department of Public Works; and
The Chief Financial Officer shall serve as the chairperson of the Committee.
The chairperson shall call meetings of the Committee as needed to perform its duties.
